This is an announcement with data and time included | 25/11/2022

Our Services

We are involved in various educational, healthcare, welfare and religious activities to uphold the lifestyle of people.

Aranery School for Hindu Students Around Kandy Town

Lectures on hinduism and lifestyle of a good human being conducted for students around Kandy town and nearby areas free of charge every sunday. This helps the parents to enlighten their children to lead a decent life.

April 2000 - Present

Random Service 2

Lectures on hinduism and lifestyle of a good human being conducted for students around Kandy town and nearby areas free of charge every sunday. This helps the parents to enlighten their children to lead a decent life.

April 2000 - Present

Random Service 3

Lectures on hinduism and lifestyle of a good human being conducted for students around Kandy town and nearby areas free of charge every sunday. This helps the parents to enlighten their children to lead a decent life.
